entries.meaning: An engraver, designer or maker of medals. [from 17th c.]
examples: [A] skilled medalist and keen student of geography, Theophilus Lewis Barbauld had friends among the European intelligentsia and liberal nobility as well as potential patrons at the British court.

entries.meaning: Someone who has received a medal. [from 18th c.]
examples: Mark Spitz set a record as an Olympic gold medalist.
